phase_prompt: How well would this applicant be able to fullful the job:
Note that we must ONLY discuss the Technical aspects of the CV provided and do NOT discuss anything else and the technical fit should be quantified as a number 0-100.

Once everyone has expressed their opinion and there is unanumous consensus, AND ONLY THEN, one of us should terminate the discussion by outputting one single line with looking like: <INFO>[Number 0-100]</INFO>
For this information extract a list of technical competences / requirements an applicant needs in order to be a good fit for the Job.
Note you should analyze the document and nothing else. Then output the word <INFO> followed by a list of requirements like this:
1. X many years of Y experience
